name: We Must Build Higher!
description:
A submission for the ACM Winter Game Jam 2022.

They must build higher! No matter the cost!

Join Gransel, Hetel, Eugene and Stacy on their quest to build a snowman on the highest peak in the neighbourhood!

However, such a feat is no child's play.

Press A and D in a rhythm to push the snowball with the twins.

Press space and Stacy will scare off the pesky crows who want to destroy your progress.

Eugene, the bravest of them all, will sacrifice himself (and his umbrella) to absorb the impact of the lightning. Position him with the arrow keys and brace yourself!

Manage all of this, and you're guaranteed to succeed in your quest to build higher!

Programmer: Stani_slav

Artist: 4ng13

Sound Designer: Rexland
